      • getFile

        public void getFile(java.lang.String URL,
                    java.lang.String folder,
                    java.lang.String fileName,
                    java.lang.String fileExtention)
        REST GET request of the receive a response of the Octet-stream to download a file.
        Parameters:
        URL - Path of the GET request.
        folder - The path to download the file towards.
        fileName - Filename the downloaded file should get.
        fileExtention - File extention the downloaded file should get.

      • checkForError

        private void checkForError(javax.ws.rs.core.Response response,
                           java.net.URI url)
        Help function to analyze the REST response to get the HTTP status and check which code it was. If it was an error code this method will throw the right exception.
        Parameters:
        response - The REST response.
        url - The URL that was being reached.
